    • Method Detail

      • onConsentRequested

        public final void onConsentRequested(java.lang.String deviceName,
                                     BluetoothLeConsentHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: BluetoothLePeripheralCallback
        Notify the host application that an consent request occurred while session sharing. The host application must call either handler.cancel() or handler.proceed().
        Specified by:
        onConsentRequested in interface BluetoothLePeripheralCallback
        Parameters:
        deviceName - The remote Bluetooth Device Name.
        handler - An BluetoothLeConsentHandler object that will handle the user's response.

      • onConsentRequested

        public abstract void onConsentRequested(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String deviceName,
                                        MASProximityLoginBLEUserConsentHandler handler)
        Notify the host application that an consent request occurred while session sharing. The host application must call either handler.cancel() or handler.proceed().
        Parameters:
        context - The current active Activity
        deviceName - The remote Bluetooth Device Name.
        handler - An handler object that will handle the user's response.
